title: Warlock Spells
content: y time the creature takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination. Allies cannot be dominated. 10 turns 18m WIS Save Concentration Flame Strike Lvl 5 Evocation ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot 5d6Fire+5d6Radiant Make a pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 18m DEX Save Hold Monster Lvl 5 Enchantment ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot Paralyse a creature. It can't move, act or react. Attac
